label: 3D resource type controlled vocabulary
definition: A SKOS ConceptScheme to be used as a controlled vocabulary for the Audiovisual Core terms dc:type and dcterms:type

label: raster data
definition: Gridded data composed of pixels that store values.

label: raw data
definition: The initial uncompressed and unprocessed data generated through a 3D modality.

label: sinogram
definition: Raw data from a CT scanner with X-Ray Detector Configuration Type of Slot (scanned slot, slit, or spot). Projections are often analyzed and processed to create a reconstructed image stack.

label: multi-file projection series
definition: Raw image data from a CT scanner with a X-Ray Detector Configuration Type of Area (single or tiled detector). Projections are often analyzed and processed to create a reconstructed image stack.

label: multi-file photo collection
definition: Multiple overlapping photographs of an object.

label: volume
definition: Three-dimensional digital representation of an object. Rendered as a grid of three-dimensional pixels (aka voxels)

label: multi-file image slice series
definition: Derived image data where each image represents a virtual slice of 3D volume. Images are stacked and arranged in series with specific spacing between slices in order to create the third dimension in a 3D volume.

label: single-file volume image
definition: A single derived file where image data for all "virtual slices" of a 3D volume are included, allowing a three-dimensionally rendered representation of a 3D object. (formats like NRRD and 3Dtiff are examples)

label: vector
definition: Image data defined by geometric points, lines, curves, and polygons.

label: point cloud with dependencies
definition: A set of points in a 3D coordinate system with optional associated texture or color file

label: polygonal mesh with dependencies
definition: A wireframe or digital surface model consisting of polygons with optional associated texture or color file
